indexterm.see: ISO Entity Sets, Added Math Symbols: Arrow Relations

refmeta.refentrytitle: Added Math Symbols: Arrow Relations Character Entities (%isoamsa;)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Added Math Symbols: Arrow Relations Character Entities

refsynopsisdiv.para:
The %isoamsa; parameter entity includes the ISO character entities with the public identifier:
ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Added Math Symbols: Arrow Relations//EN

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ISO and the W3C are cooperating to provide an official set of character entity references for XML. A description of this set is available at
